affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
cmb:
MANA COST: 90/100/110/120
COOLDOWN: 6
desc: Luna channels a concentrated beam of lunar energy at an enemy, stunning and dealing damage.
lore: Selemene smites those who encroach upon the Nightsilver Woods.
name: luna_lucent_beam

desc: Allows Luna's glaive to bounce to enemy units near the attacked unit. Each bounce deals less damage.
lore: Carefully sharpened, Luna's boomerang-like weapon cuts a wide swath through enemy numbers.
name: luna_moon_glaive

attrib:
RADIUS: 900 / 900 / 900 / 900
BONUS DAMAGE: 14 / 22 / 30 / 38
BONUS NIGHT VISION: 1000 / 1000 / 1000 / 1000
desc: Grants bonus damage to nearby allies, while blessing Luna with extra night vision.
lore: The Goddess of the Moon smiles upon her kin.
name: luna_lunar_blessing

attrib:
RADIUS: 675 / 675 / 675
STRIKE INTERVAL: 0.6 / 0.6 / 0.6
BEAMS: 5 / 8 / 11
MAX HITS: 4 / 4 / 4
DURATION: 1.8 / 3.6 / 5.4
SCEPTER BEAMS: 6 / 10 / 14
SCEPTER MAX HITS: 4 / 8 / 12
SCEPTER DURATION: 1.8 / 4.2 / 6.6
cmb:
MANA COST: 150/200/250
COOLDOWN: 160/150/140
desc:
Calls an eclipse that follows Luna, striking units with her current level of Lucent Beam. A single target can only be hit a maximum times. Unlike individual Lucent Beams, Eclipse does not stun. Eclipse turns day into night for 10 seconds.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
Eclipse doesn't work if Luna doesn't have any points in Lucent Beam.
Beams will stop if Luna is killed.
Eclipse Lucent Beams do not stun.
Will not hit invisible units.
lore: In times of great need, Selemene herself descends into the world, blocking out the light and hope of the opposed.
name: luna_eclipse
